Package org.middleheaven.persistance.db.datasource

Interface Summary
DataSourceProvider  
DataSourceService A service that provides DataSource objects.
DataSourceServiceClosable  
 

Class Summary
AbstractDataSource  
DataSourceServiceActivator If a NameDirectoryService import all DataSource present at java:/comp/env/jdbc/.
DriverDataSource  
DriverManagerDSProvider Provides DataSource objects directly from the DriverManager
EmbeddedDataSource Utilizes a HSQL database that is started by this in server mode or in-process mode.
EmbeddedDataSource.EmbededConnection  
EmbeddedDSProvider DataSourceProvider thaht embedes a HSQL implementation.
